attributes.action: Strip Sir Norman Bettison of his Knighthood.
attributes.additional_details:
We, the fans of Liverpool FC demand Justice and that Justice should mean that Norman Bettison is stripped of his Knighthood and all the benefits that that title has gained him for his complicity in the cover up of the Hillsborough Disaster, which occured on 15th April 1989, Sir Norman Bettison committed an act of perjury.
As this is a criminal act, Sir Norman Bettison should immediately be stripped of his Knighthood.
The Report of the Hillsborough Independent Panel of 12/09/2012, which investigated some 450,000 official papers and statements relating to the REAL TRUTH of his Police Force's negligence on 15/04/1989 and the complete exoneration of the fans of Liverpool FC, the survivors of The Disaster and The 96 victims who lost their lives from any blame for and contributing to the culpable manslaughter of our 96.
